name: invoice-app
description: small and simple invoice app for my dads business
author: PsclDev <me@pscl.dev>

scripts.ia: npx concurrently -n frontend,backend "yarn" "cd frontend && yarn" "cd backend && yarn"
scripts.lint: npx concurrently -n frontend,backend "cd frontend/ && yarn lint" "cd backend/ && yarn lint"
scripts.precommit: npx concurrently -n frontend,backend "cd frontend/ && yarn precommit" "cd backend/ && yarn precommit"
scripts.test: npx concurrently -n frontend,backend "cd frontend/ && yarn test" "cd backend/ && yarn test"
